pkgmetadata.longdescription: Semi-Latin Rectangles // A facility to generate balanced and partially balanced semi-Latin rectangles with cell size two, see Uto, N.P. and Bailey, R.A. (2020). "Balanced Semi-Latin rectangles: properties, existence and constructions for block size two". Journal of Statistical Theory and Practice, 14(3), 1-11, doi:10.1007/s42519-020-00118-3.
